snippet.title: Pikuniku - New Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Nintendo Switch & PC in 2018.

https://pikuniku.net/

Pikuniku is a delightful dystopian adventure game for one or two set in a strange but playful world where everything is not as perfect as it seems. 

Help the friendly folk you meet overcome hardships both big and small while uncovering a deep state conflict between technological progress and ecological security.

This game is currently in development by
Rémi Forcadell, Arnaud De Bock, Calum Bowen & Alan Zucconi,
between Paris and London.
